title: How-To: Migrating from server.jar to Launcher Startup
description:
Details how to migrate from running LogScale via the legacy server.jar method to a launcher-based
or service-based startup, preserving configuration and data directories.

examples.name: Basic migration outline
examples.description: Copy configuration to launcher config directory and enable the new service.
examples.query:
cp server.conf /etc/logscale/server.conf
systemctl enable logscale
systemctl start logscale
